The Conjuring: The Devil Made Me Do It
Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren are back to solve a chilling case involving a murder suspect who claims to have been possessed by a demonic entity.
Witness the origin story of one of Disney's most iconic villains, Cruella de Vil, as she rises to become a notorious fashion designer with a penchant for Dalmatian fur.
Following the events of the first film, the Abbott family must now face the terrors of the outside world as they continue their fight for survival in silence.
